name: Depth Visor
body:
### Welcome to DepthVisor project homepage

## The problem
Static orderbooks.

![](http://i.imgur.com/GzhGTAt.png)

Very familiar picture. Static orderbooks are very common and widely used across different trading platforms and terminals. While they do provide valuable insights into the market expectations at a very particular moment in time, they fail to show how these expectations evolve in time.

## The solution.

![](http://i.imgur.com/nC6098v.jpg)

## Features
Realtime 2d and 3d historic orderbook graphs
Cumulative and granular orderbook view
Multiple Bitcoin and Litecoin exchanges support
Realtime trades with visual representation of each trade size
Custom color themes
Custom timeframes

## Why does one need this?
Identify patterns in orderbook structure and observe current market players strategies and presence of HFT algorithms
Swiftly respond to changes i—Ç orderbook layout: sudden withdrawn of liquidity from the market, stop losses and margin call squeezes, hidden walls

## Requirements
Matlab MCR Package
